page.title: 15LODGE FARM
page.content:
Lodge Farm is an industrial area with no houses just factories.They are large and small, well known and little known. The companies include Kingsury,A.B.I., Trondex, Everest and Cash and Carry.
Kingsbury's sell furniture. A.B.I, sell the ingredients for bread and pizza bases.Trondex makes polystyrene to pack computers in.Trentmeat sell the liver, heart and tongues of animals. Cash and Carry sell food to retailers, to get in you need a card. There's no limit to what you can spend. Everest sell double glazing and other kinds of windows; they also sell doors and patio doors. The people at Kingsbury were particularly helpful to us.
